topic.title: Chapter 3
topic.shortdesc: The Three Bears return home and are shocked to find that somebody ate their porridge!

section.title: The Return of the Bears
section.p: By this time the Three Bears thought their porridge would be cool enough for them to eat it properly; so they came home to breakfast.

section.title: The Porridge Incident
section.p: Now careless Goldilocks had left the spoon of the Great Big Bear standing in his porridge.
saidroared the Great Big Bear angrily in his great, rough, gruff voice.
Then the Middle-sized Bear looked at his porridge and saw the spoon was standing in it too.
"SOMEBODY HAS BEEN AT MY PORRIDGE! NOBODY MESSES WITH MY PORRIDGE! I SWEAR I'M GOING TO KILL WHOEVER DID THIS!"
said the Middle-sized Bear in his middle-sized voice. He is rather known for throwing fits if somebody messes with his porridge.
Then the Little Wee Bear looked at his, and there was the spoon in the porridge-bowl, but the porridge was all gone!
"SOMEBODY HAS BEEN AT MY PORRIDGE, AND HAS EATEN IT ALL UP!"

said the Little Wee Bear gently in his little wee voice.
